Hi, I’m Franco

I am a digital publishing professional in the Boston area, focusing primarily on ebooks, digital workflows, and standardization. Additionally I have some affinity for design and scripting for automation. I like automation and standardization because I like to make more space for creating. I am also currently working on my first novel.

I work as Senior Content Standards Project Manager at Macmillan Learning. Contact me via Twitter, LinkedIn, or email.

Learn more about my experience or view my portfolio.
